name: Swapily
description:
Swapily is a tile-swapping puzzle game featuring beautiful photography of animals, food, landscapes & more. At the start of each level, a photo is broken in to 15 tiles. Tap the tiles to rotate and move them around the board to complete the picture. Earn points for speed and accuracy as you try to beat each of the 5 themed chapters. Earn a perfect score in all 20 levels to unlock 4 more bonus levels!

Swapily is easy to play, with just enough challenge to keep you on your toes and wanting more. Some levels are a breeze; some may have you wracking your brain. You'll need to push your observation skills and memory to their limits, seeing both the details and the big picture, to succeed. Do you have what it takes? Download Swapily today!

No ads & no network connection needed.
